name: PeproDev CF7 Database
author: Pepro Dev. Group

sections.description:
ðŸ”¥ Save Contact Form 7 Files into WP-Media, Works with latest version of CF7 and WP

ðŸ”¥ Save Contact Form 7 Submission and Uploaded files, Export data as CSV, Excel, Text or …

This plugin let you saved contact form 7 submissions with files and export them.

  • âœ… Zero-Configuration!
  • âœ… Automatically Saves Uploaded files into WordPress Media
  • âœ… Automatically Saves Submissions records into seprated database table
  • âœ… Auto-generated Data-table column from Form-fields
  • âœ… Export saved data as Excel
  • âœ… Export saved data as CSV
  • âœ… Export saved data as HTML
  • âœ… Export saved data as TXT
  • âœ… Export saved data as Print
  • âœ… Clean and Developer-friendly coded

ðŸ”¥ Version 1.5.0 | 2021-05-19 – 1400/02/29

  • Moved menu item under Cf7 Menu
  • Added pepro_cf7db_filter_header hook and new filtering on column headers
  • Enhanced Rendering CF7 Tag name as column header
  • Added View Submition button in CF7 Form Edit panel
  • Added Extras metabox in CF7 Form Edit panel
  • Removed Setting page
  • Database and settings will not be removed on uninstalling
  • Manual Database Clearing is added
  • Changed Plugin UI (somehow)

Made by love in Pepro Development Center.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. New submenu item will be added to Contact Form 7 menu
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with latest Contact Form 7 ( version 5.4 + )?

Yes, it works with new version of CF7 and saves Uploaded Files too!

How can I contribute to this plugin?

You can help us improve our works by committing your changes to Pepro Dev’s Github repository: https://github.com/peprodev/
sections.changelog:
1.9.0

  • Fixed Security Issue
  • WordPress 6.5 Compatibility

1.8.0

  • Fixed Unauthenticated Database Structure Update/Regeneration

1.7.0

  • Some UI Fix

1.6.0

  • Enhanced file saving process
  • Added force re-generate database link to plugin meta

1.5.2

  • In some hosting, database is not created
  • Compatibility with Contact Form 7 version 5.5
  • Added wp-admin/?force-cf7db to force re-generate database

1.5.0

  • Moved menu item under Cf7 Menu
  • Added pepro_cf7db_filter_header hook and new filtering on column headers
  • Enhanced Rendering CF7 Tag name as column header
  • Added View Submition button in CF7 Form Edit panel
  • Added Extras metabox in CF7 Form Edit panel
  • Removed Setting page
  • Database and settings will not be removed on uninstalling
  • Manual Database Clearing is added
  • Changed Plugin UI (somehow)

1.4.0

  • File Saving issue fixed with CF7 version 5.4 Beta

1.3.0

  • Small Fixes on showing item’s date/time

1.2.0

  • Save Contact Form 7 Files ( Upload files to WP.Media )

1.1.0

  • CF7 Compatibility Fix
  • WordPress 5.5 Compatible
  • Now Read CF7 Tags Better, and Supports Radio, Checkbox, Select and Multiselect

1.0.1

  • Directory Index Blocked for resources

1.0.0

  • initial release
